import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { useSelector, useDispatch } from "react-redux"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { detailsProduct } from "../actions/productActions"; import Rating from "../components/Rating"; import data from "./../" function ProductScreen(props) { const product = data.products.find(x => x._id === props.match.params.id) return (
